product_name: The North Face Freedom Insulated Jacket - Men's
long_description: With a no-nonsense design, the Freedom insulated jacket by The North Face delivers windproof, waterproof protection and cozy insulation to keep you dry and warm and going strong on the mountain. 2-layer HyVent(R) jacket is waterproof, windproof and breathable; seams are sealed to prevent moisture from seeping through. Insulated with Heatseeker(TM) polyester fibers to keep you warm without inhibiting movement. Fully adjustable, removable hood ensures a weather-blocking, personalized fit. Adjustable hem and rip-and-stick wrist cuffs help seal out cold air and retain valuable warmth; underarm vents let you control airflow and your comfort. Handwarmer zip pockets; wrist pocket with goggles cloth; internal media pocket; internal goggles pocket. Adjustable powder skirt with gripping elastic keeps snow out; snaps let you integrate the powder skirt with compatible pants by The North Face (sold separately). The North Face Freedom insulated jacket has a relaxed fit with a roomy body and sleeves.
short_description: With a no-nonsense design, the Freedom insulated jacket by The North Face delivers windproof, waterproof protection and cozy insulation to keep you dry and warm and going strong on the mountain.
